description: Develop an independent website to provide an online radio service.
Lead the development and scaling of an Ecommerce platform, integrating Frontend and Backend solutions.
Collaborate on UX/UI definition alongside the design team, translating complex requirements into functional and responsive technical components.
Implement Dashboard modules using Hexagonal Architecture, ensuring business logic decoupling and facilitating system testability.
Develop a comprehensive solution for financial control and management, prioritizing security in handling sensitive data and ensuring clarity in data visualization.
Design and architect an AI-driven interactive assistant integrated into internal applications, serving as an intelligent guide to optimize the learning curve and user navigation.
Lead the development of critical business training systems, optimizing the learning experience for global clients through high-performance interfaces.
Architect and deploy a modular CMS (Dashboard, Forecast, and Apps), enabling centralized and efficient content management with complex data visualization.
Develop high-fidelity simulation environments for applications in non-production settings, facilitating onboarding and technology adoption without operational risks.
Ensure code integrity and security by implementing security audits, resolving critical vulnerabilities, and raising QA standards.
Manage the lifecycle of file and permission management applications, ensuring robust traceability and granular access control.
Lead the technical definition of large-scale initiatives through the drafting of RFCs, coordinating consensus among Product, UX, and Backend teams to ensure solid and scalable architectures.
Design and maintain modular and scalable web applications in high-traffic environments, optimizing Web Vitals and performance metrics to ensure fast and reliable user experiences.
Create, provision, and maintain infrastructure and deployment environments (IaC), ensuring the correct configuration and availability of application environments.
Manage critical routing and traffic management repositories, ensuring fluid navigation and efficient load distribution across the frontend ecosystem.
Lead the implementation of AI-driven E2E automated testing strategies, raising quality standards and significantly reducing regression times.
Design and implement tracking and data measurement architectures, guaranteeing the traceability of business events for informed decision-making.
Drive a culture of technical excellence through code reviews and observability strategies, ensuring code resilience and early detection of production errors.
Research, document, and mitigate security vulnerabilities, ensuring applications comply with the highest standards of data protection and security.
Publish and maintain shared libraries and modules, facilitating code reuse and technical consistency across different organizational teams.
